title: Error cross-compiling compiler-rt with cmake for x86_64-pc-windows-gnu

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

body:
I have been compiling Rust git with several targets (`--target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu,i686-unknown-linux-gnu,x86_64-pc-windows-gnu,[...]`) on Fedora 23. After the recent change to build compiler-rt with cmake, the build fails with the following message:

`x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-rdynamic'`

```
$ cmake --version
cmake version 3.4.3

CMake suite maintained and supported by Kitware (kitware.com/cmake).
```

```
$ x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc --version
x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc (GCC) 5.2.0 20150716 (Fedora MinGW 5.2.0-1.fc23)
Copyright (C) 2015 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

```

```
$ fgrep CFG_CONFIGURE_ARGS config.mk 
CFG_CONFIGURE_ARGS   := --prefix=/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git --android-cross-path=/home/cesarb/android-sdks/temp/arm-linux-androideabi --target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu,i686-unknown-linux-gnu,x86_64-pc-windows-gnu,arm-linux-androideabi,armv7-linux-androideabi
```

```
$ make 
cfg: version 1.11.0-dev (b8214dc6c 2016-06-25)
cfg: build triple x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: host triples x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: target triples x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu i686-unknown-linux-gnu x86_64-pc-windows-gnu arm-linux-androideabi armv7-linux-androideabi
cfg: non-build target triples i686-unknown-linux-gnu x86_64-pc-windows-gnu arm-linux-androideabi armv7-linux-androideabi
cfg: host for x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu is x86_64
cfg: host for i686-unknown-linux-gnu is i386
cfg: host for x86_64-pc-windows-gnu is x86_64
cfg: host for arm-linux-androideabi is arm
cfg: host for armv7-linux-androideabi is armv7
cfg: os for x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu is unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: os for i686-unknown-linux-gnu is unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: os for x86_64-pc-windows-gnu is pc-windows-gnu
cfg: os for arm-linux-androideabi is linux-androideabi
cfg: os for armv7-linux-androideabi is linux-androideabi
cfg: have good valgrind for x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: have good valgrind for i686-unknown-linux-gnu
cfg: no good valgrind for x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
cfg: no good valgrind for arm-linux-androideabi
cfg: no good valgrind for armv7-linux-androideabi
cfg: using CC=gcc (CFG_CC)
cfg: enabling valgrind run-pass tests (CFG_ENABLE_VALGRIND_RPASS)
cfg: valgrind-rpass command set to "/usr/bin/valgrind" --error-exitcode=100 --fair-sched=try --quiet --soname-synonyms=somalloc=NONE --suppressions=/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/src/etc/x86.supp  --tool=memcheck --leak-check=full
cmake: compiler-rt
-- The C compiler identification is GNU 5.2.0
-- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 5.2.0
-- The ASM compiler identification is GNU
-- Found assembler: /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc -- broken
CMake Error at /usr/share/cmake/Modules/CMakeTestCCompiler.cmake:61 (message):
  The C compiler "/usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc" is not able to compile a
  simple test program.

  It fails with the following output:

   Change Dir: /home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp



  Run Build Command:"/usr/bin/gmake" "cmTC_edc4b/fast"

  gmake[1]: Entering directory
  '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'


  /usr/bin/gmake -f CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/build.make
  CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/build

  gmake[2]: Entering directory
  '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'


  Building C object CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/testCCompiler.c.o

  /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc -Wall -Werror -g -m64 -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0600
  -D__USE_MINGW_ANSI_STDIO=1 -Wno-error -o
  CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/testCCompiler.c.o -c
  /home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp/testCCompiler.c


  Linking C executable cmTC_edc4b

  /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/link.txt
  --verbose=1

  /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc -Wall -Werror -g -m64 -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0600
  -D__USE_MINGW_ANSI_STDIO=1 -Wno-error
  CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/testCCompiler.c.o -o cmTC_edc4b -rdynamic

  x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-rdynamic'

  CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/build.make:97: recipe for target 'cmTC_edc4b'
  failed

  gmake[2]: *** [cmTC_edc4b] Error 1

  gmake[2]: Leaving directory
  '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'


  Makefile:126: recipe for target 'cmTC_edc4b/fast' failed

  gmake[1]: *** [cmTC_edc4b/fast] Error 2

  gmake[1]: Leaving directory
  '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'






  CMake will not be able to correctly generate this project.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:12 (project)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/mk/rt.mk:465: recipe for target 'x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt.lib' failed
make: *** [x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt.lib] Error 1
```

```
$ cat x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log
The system is: Linux - 4.5.7-200.fc23.x86_64 - x86_64
Compiling the C compiler identification source file "CMakeCCompilerId.c" succeeded.
Compiler: /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc 
Build flags: -Wall;-Werror;-g;-m64;-D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0600;-D__USE_MINGW_ANSI_STDIO=1;;-Wno-error
Id flags: 

The output was:
0


Compilation of the C compiler identification source "CMakeCCompilerId.c" produced "a.exe"

The C compiler identification is GNU, found in "/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/3.4.3/CompilerIdC/a.exe"

Compiling the CXX compiler identification source file "CMakeCXXCompilerId.cpp" succeeded.
Compiler: /usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-g++ 
Build flags: 
Id flags: 

The output was:
0


Compilation of the CXX compiler identification source "CMakeCXXCompilerId.cpp" produced "a.exe"

The CXX compiler identification is GNU, found in "/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/3.4.3/CompilerIdCXX/a.exe"

```

```
$ cat x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log
Determining if the C compiler works failed with the following output:
Change Dir: /home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp

Run Build Command:"/usr/bin/gmake" "cmTC_edc4b/fast"
gmake[1]: Entering directory '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'
/usr/bin/gmake -f CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/build.make CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/build
gmake[2]: Entering directory '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'
Building C object CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/testCCompiler.c.o
/usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc    -Wall -Werror -g -m64 -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0600 -D__USE_MINGW_ANSI_STDIO=1  -Wno-error    -o CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/testCCompiler.c.o   -c /home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp/testCCompiler.c
Linking C executable cmTC_edc4b
/usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/link.txt --verbose=1
/usr/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc  -Wall -Werror -g -m64 -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0600 -D__USE_MINGW_ANSI_STDIO=1  -Wno-error     CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/testCCompiler.c.o  -o cmTC_edc4b -rdynamic 
x86_64-w64-mingw32-gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-rdynamic'
CMakeFiles/cmTC_edc4b.dir/build.make:97: recipe for target 'cmTC_edc4b' failed
gmake[2]: *** [cmTC_edc4b] Error 1
gmake[2]: Leaving directory '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'
Makefile:126: recipe for target 'cmTC_edc4b/fast' failed
gmake[1]: *** [cmTC_edc4b/fast] Error 2
gmake[1]: Leaving directory '/home/cesarb/opt/rust-git/src/rust/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/rt/compiler-rt/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'


```
